TEXT.English: The ultimate water map for Civilization IV. Powerful navies not optional!
TEXT.French: La carte marine par excellence pour Civilization IV. Il faudra une flotte puissante !
TEXT.German: Die ultimative Wasserkarte für Civilization IV. Schlagkräftige Marineflotten sind hier ein Muss!
TEXT.Italian: La mappa acquatica definitiva di Civilization IV: una potente flotta navale è d'obbligo!
TEXT.Spanish: El mapa acuático definitivo para Civilization IV. Las armadas poderosas no son opcionales.

TEXT.English: Derivative map generator that simulates a randomized Earth.
TEXT.French: Derivative map generator that simulates a randomized Earth.
TEXT.German: Derivative map generator that simulates a randomized Earth.
TEXT.Italian: Derivative map generator that simulates a randomized Earth.
TEXT.Spanish: Generador de mapas derivativo que simula una Tierra aleatoria.

TEXT.English: Random map that creates a region of a fantasy type world where much of the world is unknown and irrelevant. It allows terrain to be created on a smaller, more detailed scale than planetary maps.
TEXT.French: Random map that creates a region of a fantasy type world where much of the world is unknown and irrelevant. It allows terrain to be created on a smaller, more detailed scale than planetary maps.
TEXT.German: Random map that creates a region of a fantasy type world where much of the world is unknown and irrelevant. It allows terrain to be created on a smaller, more detailed scale than planetary maps.
TEXT.Italian: Random map that creates a region of a fantasy type world where much of the world is unknown and irrelevant. It allows terrain to be created on a smaller, more detailed scale than planetary maps.
TEXT.Spanish: Generador de mapas que crea una región de un mundo de fantasía en la cual la mayor parte del mundo es desconocido e irrelevante. Permite crear terreno en escalas mayores y más detalladas que los mapas planetarios.

TEXT.English: Evolving plate tectonics map. When the eons come and go, the world slowly changes as the continents drift and break apart, and new islands are created that may be driven into the continents.
TEXT.French: Evolving plate tectonics map. When the eons come and go, the world slowly changes as the continents drift and break apart, and new islands are created that may be driven into the continents.
TEXT.German: Evolving plate tectonics map. When the eons come and go, the world slowly changes as the continents drift and break apart, and new islands are created that may be driven into the continents.
TEXT.Italian: Evolving plate tectonics map. When the eons come and go, the world slowly changes as the continents drift and break apart, and new islands are created that may be driven into the continents.
TEXT.Spanish: Generador de mapas que emplea una tectónica de placas cambiante. Conforme los eones pasan, el mundo cambia lentamente; los continentes se mueven y separan, y aparecen nuevas islas que pueden unirse a los continentes.

TEXT.English: A large sea inhabits the center, surrounded by a thick ring of land.
TEXT.French: Un vaste océan central est entouré d'un large anneau de terre.
TEXT.German: In der Mitte dieser Karte befindet sich ein großes Meer, das von einem dicken Landring umschlossen ist.
TEXT.Italian: Un ampio mare riempie il centro della mappa, circondato da uno spesso anello di terra.
TEXT.Spanish: Un gran mar llena el centro, rodeado por un grueso anillo de tierra.

TEXT.English: Realistic world with highly random landmasses medium and small. East and west hemispheres are divided by ocean, although rarely an island chain may connect them.
TEXT.French: Monde réaliste constitué de continents dont la taille varie de petite à moyenne. Les hémisphères est et ouest sont séparés par un océan et peuvent parfois être reliés par un archipel.
TEXT.German: Realistische Welt mit zufällig verteilten mittleren und kleinen Landmassen. Osten und Westen sind durch einen Ozean getrennt, allerdings werden sie an ein paar seltenen Stellen durch Inselketten verbunden.
TEXT.Italian: Un mondo realistico con territori casuali piccoli e medi. Gli emisferi orientale e occidentale sono separati dall'oceano, anche se sporadicamente può comparire un'isola che li collega.
TEXT.Spanish: Un mundo realista con masas continentales medianas y pequeñas completamente al azar. Los hemisferios oriental y occidental están divididos por el océano, aunque algunas veces pueden quedar conectados por una cadena de islas.

TEXT.English: Pan-Gaia: "One Earth," a massive single continent.
TEXT.French: Pan-Gaia: "Une terre", un seul et énorme continent.
TEXT.German: Pangäa: "Eine Erde", ein einziger gewaltiger Kontinent.
TEXT.Spanish: Pan-gea ("una Tierra"), un solo continente enorme.

TEXT.English: Random map that simulates earth-like plate tectonics, geostrophic and monsoon winds and rainfall.
TEXT.French: Random map that simulates earth-like plate tectonics, geostrophic and monsoon winds and rainfall.
TEXT.German: Random map that simulates earth-like plate tectonics, geostrophic and monsoon winds and rainfall.
TEXT.Italian: Random map that simulates earth-like plate tectonics, geostrophic and monsoon winds and rainfall.
TEXT.Spanish: Mapa aleatorio que simula tectónica de placas similar a la de la tierra, junto con vientos geostróficos y monzónicos así como lluvia.

TEXT.English: Map script which allows to randomly select a map script between Earth3, Erebus, Fractured World, Inland Sea, Medium and Small, PlanetFall, Sea Highlands and Tectonics.
TEXT.French: Map script which allows to randomly select a map script between Earth3, Erebus, Fractured World, Inland Sea, Medium and Small, PlanetFall, Sea Highlands and Tectonics.
TEXT.German: Map script which allows to randomly select a map script between Earth3, Erebus, Fractured World, Inland Sea, Medium and Small, PlanetFall, Sea Highlands and Tectonics.
TEXT.Italian: Map script which allows to randomly select a map script between Earth3, Erebus, Fractured World, Inland Sea, Medium and Small, PlanetFall, Sea Highlands and Tectonics.
TEXT.Spanish: Script de mapa que permite escoger aleatoriamente entre Earth3, Erebus, Fractured World, Inland Sea, Medium and Small, PlaneFfall, Sea Highlands y Tectonics.

TEXT.English: Random map based on Larry Niven's famous 'Ringworld' novel. It creates a thin (16 tiles wide) but long map with artificial landmasses and climate.
TEXT.French: Random map based on Larry Niven's famous 'Ringworld' novel. It creates a thin (16 tiles wide) but long map with artificial landmasses and climate.
TEXT.German: Random map based on Larry Niven's famous 'Ringworld' novel. It creates a thin (16 tiles wide) but long map with artificial landmasses and climate.
TEXT.Italian: Random map based on Larry Niven's famous 'Ringworld' novel. It creates a thin (16 tiles wide) but long map with artificial landmasses and climate.
TEXT.Spanish: Mapa aleatorio basado en la conocida novela de Larry Niven, 'Mundo Anillo'. Crea un mapa estrecho (16 casillas de ancho) pero largo con masas de tierra y clima artificiales.

TEXT.English: Highlands, valleys and mountain ranges with several bigger lakes.
TEXT.French: Highlands, valleys and mountain ranges with several bigger lakes.
TEXT.German: Highlands, valleys and mountain ranges with several bigger lakes.
TEXT.Italian: Highlands, valleys and mountain ranges with several bigger lakes.
TEXT.Spanish: Tierras altas, valles y largas sierras surcadas por grandes lagos.

TEXT.English: Produces mountain ranges, and simulates plate tectonics, giving more realistic/earthlike terrain (mountain ranges, mountains near coasts like the Andes, or between subcontinents like the Himalaia).
TEXT.French: Crée des chaînes de montagne et simule la tectonique des plaques, pour un terrain plus réaliste et plus semblable à la Terre (chaînes de montagne, montagnes à proximité des côtes comme les Andes, ou entre différents sous-continents comme l'Himalaya).
TEXT.German: Erstellt Bergketten und simuliert Plattentektonik für realistischeres/irdischeres Gelände (wie Bergketten, Berge in Küstennähe, wie etwa die Anden, oder zwischen Subkontinenten, wie etwa der Himalaja).
TEXT.Italian: Produce catene montuose e simula la tettonica a placche fornendo un territorio più realistico e simile a quello della Terra (montagne costiere come le Ande oppure tra subcontinenti come l'Himalaya).
TEXT.Spanish: Produce cadenas montañosas y simula placas tectónicas, lo que da un terreno más realista y similar al terrestre (cadenas montañosas; montañas cerca de la costa, como los Andes, o entre subcontinentes, como el Himalaya).

TEXT.English: Terra generates random land masses similar to those of the planet Earth. All players begin in the Old World. These maps are extra large!
TEXT.French: Des continents similaires à ceux de la Terre sont créés aléatoirement. Tous les joueurs commencent dans l'Antiquité. Ces cartes sont immenses !
TEXT.German: Terra generiert zufällige Landflächen, ähnlich wie die auf dem Planeten Erde. Alle Spieler beginnen zunächst in der Alten Welt. Diese Kartenvarianten sind besonders groß!
TEXT.Italian: Terra genera delle masse terrestri casuali simili a quelle del nostro pianeta. Tutti i giocatori iniziano nel Vecchio Mondo. Queste mappe sono grandissime!
TEXT.Spanish: Terra genera al azar masas de tierra similares a las del planeta Tierra. Todos los jugadores empiezan en el Viejo Mundo. ¡Estos mapas son supergrandes!

TEXT.French: Randomisation de la Terre actuelle (départ : Antiquité)
TEXT.German: Zufällige Anordnung der Erde (Start Alte Welt)
TEXT.Spanish: Tierra real al azar (inicio en Viejo Mundo)
